root.name: Sverigejakten
root.description: GameplayIn Sverigejakten you have the mission as a reconnaissance leader to catch the villain. At your disposal is a number of detectives who will travel Sweden for clues about the mysterious man. You also have an archive of geographical facts. If you don't already know the geography of Sweden, you will after playing this game. You will learn: the cities of Sweden, provinces, large lakes, islands and mountain chains. As well as: the infrastructure of Sweden, such as railroads, airports and ferries. And also region specific things, such as accents and various sights worth seeing.System RequirementsWin3.1/ 95/98, CPU: 486DX, 8 MB RAM (12 MB for Windows 95).It was released in 1998.
